creator: DouglasS3
title: Robô Manipulador Com Garra  Sem Fio.
description: This project outlines the construction and programming of a wireless robotic arm with a gripper. It includes code for both wireless RF control and wired control options. The robotic arm is controlled using code created by Douglas Santana da Silva.
steps: Step 1: Implement Robot Control via RF Modules. Download and use the provided 'emissor.ino' (transmitter) and 'receptor.ino' (receiver) code for wireless control of the robotic arm.
Step 2: Implement Wired Robot Control. Download and use the 'controle robô com fio e manipulador com garra.ino' code for wired control of the robotic arm and gripper.
